thread.title: Creditors Call for Investigation Into Sabine/Forest Merger
thread.title_full: Creditors Call for Investigation Into Sabine/Forest Merger - WSJ

author: Tom Corrigan
title: Creditors Call for Investigation Into Sabine/Forest Merger
text:
Unsecured creditors have requested a bankruptcy court’s approval to begin a wide-ranging investigation into Sabine Oil & Gas Corp.’s merger with Forest Oil Corp. last year, a deal they have called “disastrous.”
In court papers filed Tuesday with the U.S. Bankruptcy Court in Manhattan, the committee representing unsecured creditors said the sheer size of the lawsuits that could stem from the investigation warrants “a prompt start...
